评论概述: Good Quality - But Less Easy to Style Than You'd Think
评论详情: The bodysuit is super durable, stretchy, and comfortable. It doesn't shift when wearing. Its inner material has a silky soft quality that feels great against your skin. The clasps at the bottom stay done until you manually pull them apart.  The material is that of those shiny, athletic leggings - which gives it great stretch and all-season comfort. But it also gives it a shininess and slickness that makes it more difficult to visually style with other cotton or soft materials.  Additionally, I do not agree with previous reviews I've read about its functionality without a bra. Because of the neckline, you cannot wear a full cup bra without it peeking out. Maybe a plunging balconette would do. You, also, cannot reliably wear it without a bra or with nipple covers - as the bodysuit adheres so closely to your body that both will show (the former really only shows if you are cold).  Overall, its good. I've worn it a few times regardless of the issues I've pointed out - but more as a layer than a top itself. I was comfortable the whole night. However, don't believe the reviews that say its the holy grail of all bodysuits.

评论概述: No Bra Needed - Big Bust Friendly
评论详情: I love Reoria, I've bought many of their styles in multiple colors. They're lined very well but I admit sometimes my nipples may poke through a tiny bit, but the lining usually has it under control. I'm a 36H ( maybe larger i haven't been properly sized since i gave birth ) but regardless my breast's are large and fit very well into the bodysuit with limited squeeze effect. I don't ever feel squished like I'm about to pop out, but I am supported where my boob's look perky without being crammed in.  The crotch portion is a little long since I have a short torso, but I just hide it in my bottoms and it doesn't create any discomfort.  Would absolutely recommend.

The back end fit more like a thong and hardly covered anything.  I ended up having to wear shorts OVER the body suit before you couldn't see every curve and dimple under the dress I was wearing.
